attributes.review: I just wanted to be in the know on all the Trump related news, such as when he will finally do the American people a favor and resign. But this app is not user friendly. Have fun trying to navigate around the horrible interface. There are pictures of trump EVERYWHERE literally everywhere and they distract from all the popcorn worthy content available on there. I hope this app gets deleted from the App Store because I donâ€™t want anyone else to have as traumatic of an experience as me.

When I went deeper into the app I saw an orange puddle of barf ğŸ¤® this is were my opinion on this app started to go downhill. It was quite unpleasant. I was trying my hardest to find the good in this app but I just couldnâ€™t see it. In conclusion, please donâ€™t download this, and if you do, you WILL regret it.
attributes.title: Gross

attributes.review:
The app design is truly horrible! The very first thing it does is ask you for personal information that you canâ€™t access it without. And like hell I was giving that info to a fascist dictator! 
     Now onto the content, I was greeted by an image of a horrifying man with the worst possible spray tan out there. His comb over looks like literal yarn and could make a man Ill to look at for to long. Additionally, many of the signs used by the campaign are repurposed nazi symbols such as his 2020 Eagle holding the flag and red triangles for antifascists.

Vote Blue In November!
